name: Introduction to Linguistics
description: This course is an introduction to the field of linguistics. It covers the fundamentals of linguistics, including the study of language, phonetics, phonology, morphology, syntax, and semantics.

name: Phonetics and Phonology
description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of the fields of phonetics and phonology. It covers the basics of articulatory, acoustic, and perceptual phonetics; phonological theory; and the description of phonological systems.

name: Morphology and Syntax
description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of the fields of morphology and syntax. It covers the basics of morphology and syntax, as well as more advanced topics such as argument structure, case, and phrase structure.

name: Semantics
description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of the field of semantics. It covers the basics of semantics, as well as more advanced topics such as truth-conditional and modal semantics.
